Hi Joe,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Celia sent me an invite to a meeting tomorrow at 5:30 PM for a presentation by a Mr. Jules Angibeau for Mr. Patrick. (At HO1)

 

I did a small check and it seems he is a COO for a startup health insurance procurement tool. (https://www.heale.io/)

 

New company, almost no followers and no partnering insurance companies. The person has no insurance background as well. He is a founder of a renal space company for displaying art.



 

In all cases, should I request Celia to invite Dany Nehme as well or I just attend the meeting for now?

 

I am surprised how he even secured a meeting.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​	
SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION	
M.C.T. FZE	
DUBAI

Dear Lali and Celia,

I hope this email finds you well.
Patrick asked me to find time this week or next week to meet him.
I am aware his agenda is very busy.
I am available to meet at his convenience, weekend included.

I am available to meet at his convenience, weekend included.

Sorry I made a typo in Celia's email address initially and my first email bounced back.

Sincerely,
Jules

Hi Joe,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Celia sent me an invite to a meeting tomorrow at 5:30 PM for a presentation by a Mr. Jules Angibeau for Mr. Patrick. (At HO1)

 

I did a small check and it seems he is a COO for a startup health insurance procurement tool. (https://www.heale.io/ <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.heale.io%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce6d56f7760c34b91752408dcdc6c9296%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638627606096739713%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ehqyjgjnvU%2Bids636bdXHkkrp3jhjkEDkRQju62neW0%3D&reserved=0> )

 

New company, almost no followers and no partnering insurance companies. The person has no insurance background as well. He is a founder of a renal space company for displaying art.



 

In all cases, should I request Celia to invite Dany Nehme as well or I just attend the meeting for now?

 

I am surprised how he even secured a meeting.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop
